snippet: The size of local, state and federal governments has declined in the first three years of the Obama administration, a feat unseen in 40 years.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off The Charts column details how the government sector of the American economy has shrunk during the first three years of Pres Obama's administration, the first such shrinkage in 40 years.
lead_paragraph: The size of local, state and federal governments has declined in the first three years of the Obama administration, a feat unseen in 40 years.
